caption.p: ( a,c) TM-30-18 color vector graphics (CVGs) and ( b,d) local chroma shifts of PKG-1-1UV2B-GR and PKG-2-1UV2B-GR LEDs. A black circle shows the reference illuminant, and the red circles represent the CVGs of the fabricated LEDs. The arrow indicates the corresponding color change induced by 16 hue bins compared to the reference illuminant.
